name: 2024: a spacing game
description:
If there's an offset try zooming in/out in your browser 2024: a spacing game

Deep in sequestered space, you get a call from mission control... to construct a Dyson sphere.

Use your wits to solve this incredible work, and seize the victory royale.

Are you up to the task?!

Controls

Mouse only

Use your left click mouse button to harvest the planets. 🪐

Explore and click on things to see what happens. 👀
